summary: A test suite that validates the behavior of a configuration handling component, providing setup/teardown utilities and a collection of test cases covering inclusion logic, alias resolution, multi‑value handling, renaming, conditional includes, lock re‑entry, and interaction with a caching layer.
business_intent: Automate verification of configuration system features to ensure correct parsing, merging, and runtime behavior, reducing regression risk and supporting reliable deployment of software that depends on dynamic configuration.
